name: Gayle Goossen
title: When People Are More Important than Profit
summary: Most businesses are run with a focus on profits, often to the detriment of personal relationships. Gayle Goossen however, operates Barefoot Creative by putting relationships first. Even though our culture prizes money and encourages people to make a quick buck at the expense of others, she stands firm in her faith and uses her business as a platform to love others.
